author: kpedro88
body: @dnoonan08 found that the QIE10 shape in CMSSW was not consistent with the calibration procedure that will be used for the QIE10. Starting the bins at -0.5 instead of -1 produces a consistent conversion between fC and ADC. This PR was backported from 81X.
title: fix QIE10 shape: bins start at -0.5
